document.masterDocTitle: New and little known taxa of neotenic lyropaeine net-winged beetles (Coleoptera Lycidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New and little known taxa of neotenic lyropaeine net-winged beetles (Coleoptera Lycidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Platerodrilus Pic, 1921: 13
.

Type species:
Platerodrilus sinuatus Pic, 1921
(subsequent designation by Kazantsev 2002 ).

=
Falsocalochromus Pic, 1942: 3
.

Type species:
Falsocalochromus ruficollis Pic, 1942
(by monotypy).

Type species: Platerodriloplesius
bicolor Wittmer, 1941
(by monotypy).

=
Platrilus Kazantsev, 2009: 61
.

Type species:
Platerodrilus hirtus Wittmer, 1938
(original designation).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) angustatus Pic, 1921
: 14. Sumatra .

Platerodrilus (s. str.) apicalis Pic, 1936: 56
. Borneo (Mt. Kinabalu).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) atricolor Pic, 1938: 281
. West Malaysia ( Pahang : Cameron Highlands).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) atronotatus Pic, 1943: 7
. West Malaysia .

Platerodrilus (s. str.) borneensis Wittmer, 1966
: 230 (in subgen. Platerodriloplesius ). Eastern Borneo (Bengen R.).
Platerodrilus (s. str.) brastagicola Kazantsev
,
sp. nov.
Sumatra (Berastagi).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) corporaali , Pic, 1921
: 14. Sumatra .

Platerodrilus (s. str.) crassicornis Pic, 1923
: 73. Sumatra .

Platerodrilus (s. str.) dilataticornis Pic, 1924
: 1. Sumatra .

Platerodrilus (s. str.) gorbunovi Kazantsev
,
sp. nov.
West Malaysia ( Selangor ).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) hirtus Wittmer, 1938: 36
. Java .

Platerodrilus (s. str.) ijenensis Masek et Bocak, 2014: 48
. Java (Ijen N.P.).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) inapicalis Pic, 1937
: 144. Sumatra .

Platerodrilus (s. str.) kambanganus Kazantsev
,
sp. nov.
Java (south coast).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) korinchianus (Blair, 1928)
: 181 (
Duliticola
). Sumatra (Korinchi).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) latebasalis Pic, 1938: 373
. West Malaysia (Tioman).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) luteus Masek et Bocak, 2014: 50
. Sumatra (Mt. Kerinci).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) major Pic, 1921
: 14. Sumatra .

Platerodrilus (s. str.) maninjauensis Masek et Bocak, 2014: 52
. Sumatra (lake Maninjau).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) montanus Masek et Bocak, 2014: 53
. Sumatra (Brastagi).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) ngi Masek et Bocak, 2014: 45
. Singapore , West Malaysia (Tioman).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) palawanensis , Masek et Bocak, 2014: 54
. Philippines ( Palawan ).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) piceicollis Pic, 1943: 12
. Borneo (not India , as indicated in Kazantsev, 2009 ).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) ranauensis Masek et Bocak, 2014: 56
. Sumatra (lake Ranau).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) reductus Pic, 1937: 144
. Java (not Vietnam , as indicated on the map in
Masek et al ., 2015
).
Platerodrilus (s. str.) robinsoni (Blair, 1928)
: 182 (
Duliticola
). Sumatra (Mt. Kerinci).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) rotundicollis , Wittmer, 1938
: 301. Java .

Platerodrilus (s. str.) ruficollis (Pic, 1942)
: 4 (
Falsocalochromus
). West Malaysia ( Selangor ), Singapore .

=

: 2. Java .

. Sumatra (Brastagi).

. Sumatra (Brastagi).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) sinuatus , Pic, 1921: 13
. West Malaysia ( Pahang ).

Platerodrilus (s. str.) talamauensis Masek et Bocak, 2014: 58
. Sumatra (Mt. Talamau).

: 14. Sumatra .
